hadiths.text: Abu Ishaq said “I was with Al Aswad in the congregational mosque. He said “Fathimah daughter of Qais came to ‘Umar bin Al Khattab(may Allaah be pleased with him). (When she narrated the tradition about her divorce) he said “We are not to leave the Book of our Lord and the Sunnah of our Prophet (ﷺ) for the statement of a woman, we do not know whether she remembered it or not.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَنْكَرَ ذَلِكَ عَلَى فَاطِمَةَ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Rejected What Fatimah Bint Qais Said
